dialogue: You've been practicing. That spin almost looked graceful.
context: Speaking to Best Friend while dancing

dialogue: It was just harmless dancing, relax. I was just feeling fly and wanted to have some fun.
Honey, you're overreacting.
Well, maybe if you were willing to dance with me more
GO TO BED!

Wow, I've never heard that one before! Divorce over a little spin? Is this your new punchline to guilt-trap me?!! You want to leave me? Fine. But you're not taking my child. That's my legacy. That's mine.
They're calling it cheating now. One dance, one laugh, one misunderstanding, and suddenly I'm the villain.
Watch it.
She humiliated me. Accused me in front of everyone like I'm some fool.
What?
Enough. I just want her to regret it.
I can't believe we're dividing our entire life over text.
Visual superiority?
Did I just lose custody of the Wi-Fi?
It's just stuff, kid. It's how the game works. Your mother's being petty, and that Judge has a thing for smoothies. It doesn't mean anything.
I'm not going to argue with you about kitchen appliances. Go put that phone down.
What? Give me that.
Stop! That's private. You do not look at other people's. Give me that phone!
You don't understand adult relationships. This is all just a big misunderstanding, a rough patch. Your mother isn't innocent either.

You listen to me! I am your father! You don't take sides in this! This is a mess she started with her accusations! Do you think I'm the only one who's been looking elsewhere? Do you think she's a saint?
Where did you find that?
Wait, I didn't actually
Why do YOU have HIS phone?
IT LOOKS LIKE YOU WERE SLEEPING WITH THE JUDGE!
I cannot BELIEVE this! You accused ME, OVER A DANCE, While you were with the JUDGE?!
So what now?
Maybe stop talking.
This is ridiculous! Over texts? Over a dance?! This is bias! This is corruption! This is!
